entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: Strongbox Pro
entry.content:

Priceï¼š89,99Â â‚¬

Application Description

O Strongbox Ã© uma aplicaÃ§Ã£o para manter todas suas senhas armazenadas com seguranÃ§a e protegidas por uma senha mestra. SÃ£o suportados of formatos abertos PasswordSafe e KeePass. *** Funcionalidades *** - Desbloqueio com Face ID/Touch ID para garantir a maior conveniÃªncia, seguranÃ§a e velocidade de acesso possiveis. - Desbloqueio com CÃ³digo PIN com opÃ§Ã£o de PIN sob CoerÃ§Ã£o para lidar com situaÃ§Ãµes difÃ­ceis. - ProteÃ§Ã£o YubiKey - proteja suas bases de dados com um token fÃ­sico. - Seguro - protegido por criptografia de nÃ­vel militar. - Privativo - Um visualizador de anexos embutido no aplicativo protege seus documentos, fotos e vÃ­deos. - Audite suas senhas - Automaticamente consulte se sua base de dados contÃ©m senhas fracas, incluindo consultas com o 'Have I Been Pwned'. - Suporte a Nuvem, para que vocÃª consiga acessar seus cofres armazenados no iCloud, Dropbox, OneDrive, Google Drive, WebDAV ou SFTP mesmo quando estiver offline. Use o app Arquivos para ter muito mais opÃ§Ãµes de armazenamento ou guarde seu cofre de maneira segura apenas no seu dispositivo. VocÃª escolhe onde guardar seu cofre. - Consulte todas as suas senhas e segredos instantaneamente usando uma busca poderosa e profunda. Autocomplete novos registros e gere automaticamente senhas seguras. - CompatÃ­vel - Importe/Exporte usando o app Arquivos, Email, CSV, Compartilhamento de Arquivos do iTunes ou armazenamento na nuvem. - PadrÃµes da IndÃºstria - SÃ£o usados os formatos jÃ¡ testados pelo tempo Password Safe e KeePass, entÃ£o vocÃª pode importar qualquer cofre de senhas que tiver. - AbundÃ¢ncia de Funcionalidades - GeraÃ§Ã£o de senhas incrivelmente configurÃ¡vel incluindo Diceware (XKCD) e senhas normais. - Auto limpeza da Ã¡rea de transferÃªncia apÃ³s tempo definido. - HistÃ³rico de registro. - ReferÃªncias de Campos do KeePass, Etiquetas, Ãcones Personalizados, FavIcons (incluindo busca e download automÃ¡ticos). - Suporte a geraÃ§Ã£o de cÃ³digos de AutenticaÃ§Ã£o em Duas Etapas (TOTP) - QR Codes, Steam e Manuais. *** O Strongbox Ã© Freemium *** Isso significa que o Strongbox Ã© gratuito com um conjunto bÃ¡sico de funcionalidades, mas se vocÃª quiser existem funcionalidades melhoradas na versÃ£o Pro. VocÃª pode se inscrever em um PerÃ­odo de Testes Gratuito por 90 dias para testar todas as funcionalidades Pro que quiser, sem obrigaÃ§Ãµes, mas a maioria das pessoas considera a versÃ£o gratuita perfeitamente adequada. --------------------------------------------------------------------- â€¢ O Strongbox provÃª Compras no Aplicativo (tanto para assinaturas auto renovÃ¡veis quanto para o pagamento Ãºnico) das versÃµes Pro do App. â€¢ Uma opÃ§Ã£o de pagamento adiantado (que nÃ£o Ã© feita dentro do App) tambÃ©m existe, consulte o site do Strongbox para mais detalhes. â€¢ Assinaturas sÃ£o auto renovÃ¡veis com pagamentos recorrentes. Cancele a qualquer momento. â€¢ Os perÃ­odos de tempo das assinaturas sÃ£o mensal, trimestral ou anual, Ã  escolha do usuÃ¡rio. â€¢ O usuÃ¡rio tambÃ©m pode escolher comprar, com um pagamento Ãºnico, uma versÃ£o Pro vitalÃ­cia do App. â€¢ O pagamento serÃ¡ cobrado da sua Conta iTunes na confirmaÃ§Ã£o da compra. â€¢ A assinatura Ã© renovada automaticamente a menos que a auto renovaÃ§Ã£o seja desativada com pelo menos 24 horas de antecedÃªncia do fim do perÃ­odo atual. â€¢ A Conta iTunes serÃ¡ cobrada pela renovaÃ§Ã£o dentro das 24 horas antecedentes ao fim do perÃ­odo atual, e identificarÃ¡ o custo da renovaÃ§Ã£o. â€¢ Assinaturas podem ser gerenciadas e a auto renovaÃ§Ã£o pode ser desligada na pÃ¡gina de ConfiguraÃ§Ã£o da Conta apÃ³s a compra. â€¢ Qualquer porÃ§Ã£o nÃ£o utilizada do perÃ­odo de testes, se oferecido, serÃ¡ revogada quando o usuÃ¡rio comprar uma assinatura onde aplicÃ¡vel. â€¢ A PolÃ­tica de Privacidade pode ser encontrada aqui: https://strongboxsafe.com/privacy-policy â€¢ Os Termos de Uso podem ser encontrados aqui: https://strongboxsafe.com/terms

entry.title: SmallFish Chess for Stockfish
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š5,99Â â‚¬ â†’ Gratuito [Gratuito ~ 5,99Â â‚¬]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šGratuito

Application Description

SmallFish is a project based on the Stockfish chess engine. It uses the latest Stockfish chess engine (Stockfish 17.1), rated about Elo 3600+ and is the strongest chess app on the App Store. SmallFish offers you three distinct ways to improve your game. You can review your game with comments, or study how Stockfish thinks, or track your progress. No in-app purchase, no ads, no data tracking. SmallFish is simply amazing. It's small but powerful, you'll be surprised. Features --------- - Blunder checking - Multiple line analysis - Graphical evaluation of your game - Game previews - Dark mode support - Endgame tablebase - Opening books Why not just download and try it yourself?

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: NotePad++ - Pro
entry.summary: Notepad Pro+ Advanced Tools: 5,99Â â‚¬ â†’ 0,99Â â‚¬
entry.content:
Discount Information

Compras integradas

  • Notepad Pro+ Advanced Toolsï¼š5,99Â â‚¬ â†’ 0,99Â â‚¬ [0,99Â â‚¬ ~ 5,99Â â‚¬]

All Price Information

Priceï¼š1,99Â â‚¬

Compras integradas

  • Notepad Pro+ Advanced Toolsï¼š0,99Â â‚¬

Application Description

Notepad++ - Smart Notes, Secure Data & PDF Manager Notepad++ helps you save, organize, and protect your important notes, memos, and favorite data in one powerful app. Create notes with different colors, images, font styles, and font sizes to match your needs and stay organized effortlessly. With iCloud Sync, your notes are safely stored in iCloud so you can access, restore, or delete them anytime, directly from the app. Notepad++ also includes a Todayâ€™s Notes Widget that displays the current date and gives timely notifications, helping you stay on top of your daily tasks and reminders. In addition to fast and simple note-taking, Notepad++ now includes a built-in PDF Editor & Manager, making it easier to work with documents in one place. Key Features:- - Notes & Organization â€¢ Unlimited notes storage â€¢ Multiple note colors â€¢ Pinned & private notes â€¢ Custom font styles & font sizes â€¢ Sort notes by name or date â€¢ Auto-delete notes after a selected time â€¢ Easy note sharing â€¢ One-tap quick note creation - Security â€¢ App lock with multiple passcode options â€¢ Touch ID & Face ID support - iCloud Sync â€¢ iCloud sync for notes â€¢ Retrieve or delete notes from iCloud - Widgets & Notifications â€¢ Widget for todayâ€™s notes â€¢ Notifications for daily notes & reminders - PDF Editor & Manager â€¢ Create and manage PDF files â€¢ Edit existing PDFs â€¢ Export notes as PDF â€¢ Share PDFs easily â€¢ Add signatures and stamps to PDFs â€¢ Store and organize PDFs in one place Note down anything, anytime, anywhere with just one tap and never miss an important thought or reminder again with smart notifications. Note: All your data is stored locally on your device. We do not access, collect, or store your data. Your privacy is fully protected. Thank you for using this app. Weâ€™re committed to improving your experience with every update. Keep writing and stay organized!

Application Screenshot

iPad

entry.title: where I put it
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š0,99Â â‚¬ â†’ Gratuito [Gratuito ~ 0,99Â â‚¬]ï¼‰

Priceï¼šGratuito

Application Description

A simple cleanup management app that will quickly find your search! Do you have trouble Looking for items? Find your item quickly with "where I put itâ€! Build a house, make furniture, assign lockers, and put all your belongings. Books, important collections, hobby tools, children's toys, seasonal clothes, and items of recollections, the app will help you organize all things in the house.
